extracted_playbook.condition: Does the organization have ICS/SCADA devices?

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate ICS/SCADA Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Isolate ICS/SCADA systems and networks from corporate and internet networks using strong perimeter controls, and limit any communications entering or leaving ICS/SCADA perimeters.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multifactor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce multifactor authentication for all remote access to ICS networks and devices whenever possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Develop and Exercise Cyber Incident Response Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Have a cyber incident response plan, and exercise it regularly with stakeholders in IT, cybersecurity, and operations.

extracted_playbook.title: Change ICS/SCADA Passwords Regularly
extracted_playbook.description: Change all passwords to ICS/SCADA devices and systems on a consistent schedule, especially all default passwords, to device-unique strong passwords to mitigate password brute force attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure OPC UA Security
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure OPC UA security is correctly configured with application authentication enabled and explicit trust lists.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure OPC UA Certificate Private Keys
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the OPC UA certificate private keys and user passwords are stored securely.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain known-good offline backups for faster recovery upon a disruptive attack, and conduct hashing and integrity checks on firmware and controller configuration files to ensure validity of those backups.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Network Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Limit ICS/SCADA systems’ network connections to only specifically allowed management and engineering workstations.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Management Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Robustly protect management systems by configuring Device Guard, Credential Guard, and Hypervisor Code Integrity (HVCI).

extracted_playbook.title: Install EDR Solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Install Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) solutions on these subnets and ensure strong anti-virus file reputation settings are configured.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Log Collection and Retention
extracted_playbook.description: Implement robust log collection and retention from ICS/SCADA systems and management subnets.

extracted_playbook.title: Leverage Continuous OT Monitoring
extracted_playbook.description: Leverage a continuous OT monitoring solution to alert on malicious indicators and behaviors, watching internal systems and communications for known hostile actions and lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Use ICSNPP for Enhanced Network Visibility
extracted_playbook.description: For enhanced network visibility to potentially identify abnormal traffic, consider using CISA’s open-source Industrial Control Systems Network Protocol Parsers (ICSNPP).

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all applications are only installed when necessary for operation. Enforce principle of least privilege. Only use admin accounts when required for tasks, such as installing software updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Investigate Denial of Service Symptoms
extracted_playbook.description: Investigate symptoms of a denial of service or connection severing, which exhibit as delays in communications processing, loss of function requiring a reboot, and delayed actions to operator comments as signs of potential malicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Unusual Drivers
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor systems for loading of unusual drivers, especially for ASRock driver if no ASRock driver is normally used on the system.
